edited_stories.edited_story_text: Our family went to San Francisco and walked across the Golden Gate Bridge. Mom loved looking out across the water. We took in the amazing view looking across the Bay. We even saw this cute little bird. Eventually we caught the cable car back to town.

eventually we caught the cable car back to town .
